version_description: Brand new dedesign for iOS7.

1. Add QR Code generator.
2. Scanning QR image from photo album.
1. Fix a bug which leads the url visiting error.
1. Enhance the batch scan function.
Improve the scan speed.
Improve the scan speed.
Optimized for iOS 12 and iPhone X
Barcode library management. Cloud data backup. Team collaboration. Inventory management. Barcode counter. Barcode data table. Barcode stickers print, and more.
Optimized the data migration process, Optimized the batch scan flow.  New features include: cashier, data copy, QR code generator, scan sound/vibration configuration.

Optimized the product management, supporting weighing goods barcodes used in supermarket. Optimized the batch scan operation, defer the info input operation. Optimized the inventory management, automatically adding new barcode product, continuing use the old S/N form. Adding new scan setting page, allow you to custom the Scan Tone, Scan Interval, Show Alert options.
1. Add more copy options for scanned barcodes, such as "Barcode,Count".  2. Optimize the login process and allow skip "login" 3. Other improvements.
This upgrade brings the Crosshair in the scan screen. Don't worry about the multiple codes scanning issue any more.
1. Add a toggle button to enable/disable the crosshair function 2. Fix a translation bug in scan history.

1. Home screen adopts newly designed card menu 2. Add folder function, can export multiple files in batches 3. Multiple files can be combined and exported into one Excel 4. Enhanced barcode search function 5. Optimize inventory query function
Merge multiple files into one Excel and export for Barcode Counter.
Add support for decoding QR code with GBK and ShiftJIS encoding.
1. Batch import for inventory management 2. Be able to delete the inventory operation history
Fix a bug when import batches of barcodes into product library
Support Data Matrix Code with Chinese characters. Fix a bug in batch scan operation which may prevent a code from deleting. And other improvement.
Advanced search functions, Card/List view, Minimum inventory level alert, File sort and more new futures.
Lots of improvements for inventory feature, especially when you manage inventory on multiple devices.
Support bluetooth barcode scanner and wireless keyboard.
New Feature: Team member role and permissions management
Solve a problem when adding team member.

New features:
1. Show the sync status on bottom banner
2. Support bluetooth printers for receipt and label
3. Custom fields when export or print
4. Duplicated barcode setting
5. Edit/Delete barcode in warehouse form
6. Other improvement
Bug fix.

1. Support portable thermal printer
2. New preview page before export excel
3. New summary field for printing
4. Other improvement
Bug fixes.

1. Solved the problem of page jam due to large amount of data. 
2. Bug fix.
1. Import products from Excel file. 2. Other improvement
Fix the bug which can crash the App while scanning barcode. All users, please upgrade to this version.

Bug fixes and performance improvement.
